relation: The last time the file was accessed.
The last time the file was modified.
A CompletionCallback to be called upon completion of Touch().
textBeforeTable: Parameters: A constructor used when you have an existing PP_Resource for a FileRef and which to create a C++ object that takes an additional reference to the resource. [explicit] ) resource PP_Resource  ( pp::FileRef::FileRef Default constructor for creating an is_null() FileRef object. [inline] ) ( pp::FileRef::FileRef Constructor & Destructor Documentation The FileRef class represents a "weak pointer" to a file in a file system. Detailed Description ReadDirectoryEntries (const CompletionCallbackWithOutput< std::vector< DirectoryEntry > > &callback) int32_t  Query (const CompletionCallbackWithOutput< PP_FileInfo > &callback) int32_t
textAfterTable: pp::FileRef::FileRef ( PassRef  , PP_Resource  resource  ) A constructor used when you have received a PP_Resource as a return value that has already been reference counted. Parameters: [in] resource A PP_Resource corresponding to file reference. pp::FileRef::FileRef ( const FileSystem &  file_system, const char *  path  ) A constructor that creates a weak pointer to a file in the given file system. File paths are POSIX style. If the path is malformed, the resulting FileRef will have a null PP_Resource. Parameters: [in] file_system A FileSystem corresponding to a file system type. [in] path A path to the file. Must begin with a '/' character.
